item.title: 5 laws every developer should know
item.description: Laws - or principles - can give us guidance and teach us lessons from our peersâ€™ mistakes. In this article, I will introduce you to five laws I always have in the back of my mind when designing or implementing a software. Some of them relate to pure development, some are related to system organizations. All of them should be useful for your growth as a software engineer.
